generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface extending into the distance, with visible lane markings and curbs.
- sidewalk: A paved pedestrian walkway is visible along the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and adjacent to buildings.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring windows and doors.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the left side of the road and in the background.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked along the left side of the road, and one car is visible in the distance on the right side.
- pole: A small vertical pole is visible near the center of the road, likely a traffic or utility pole.
- traffic sign: A small traffic sign is visible mounted on the building facade on the right side of the road.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible between the sidewalk and the building on the right side of the road.
